title: Implement AuditTrail Event Logging for Lane C
description: Extend the AuditTrail to support structured logging of all Lane C policy decisions, overrides, and relevant session events. Ensure events are stored in append-only JSONL format and support replay for session timelines.
acceptance_criteria: AuditTrail logs all Lane C policy decisions and overrides
Events are stored in append-only JSONL files
AuditTrail supports replaying session timelines (transcript, decisions, tool calls)
AuditTrail respects configuration for transcript/audio storage
